column3: especially if you love variety in your meal. A really fun experience and a great place to take out of towners and family. If you go with friends
column4: just make sure you share nicely and be careful
column5: it's easy to get carried away ordering lots of plates in a group
column6: make sure you set a price or plate limit before you go in! :0) On the flip side
column7: it can be a pretty cheap meal if it's just two of you because you can watch what you order easily. Ok
column8: enough reading about it! Turn off your computer and head on over to Cafe Ba Ba Reeba! There are pitchers of sangria calling your name!
